player.name: John Stockton
player.physicalDescription: smaller 6'1" guard, stocky strong build, short brown hair, intense focused expression, white skin, deceptively tough, blue collar appearance
player.archetype: The Accountant, all-time assists and steals leader, quiet consistent greatness

figure.name: Elisha
figure.attributeDescription: the hairy mantle/cloak passed down from Elijah, symbol of prophetic succession and double portion of spirit
figure.visualStyle: humble prophet of Israel, successor to Elijah
figure.clothing: simple prophet's garments, the inherited mantle of Elijah worn over tunic, leather belt, worn sandals
figure.physicalDescription: bald head (as mentioned in scripture), neat beard, kind but determined eyes, humble appearance that belies great power, weathered skin
figure.archetype: The Faithful Successor, performed twice the miracles, steady servant

connection.thematic: Both were steady, faithful servants who quietly accumulated impossible numbers
connection.narrative: Elisha performed double the miracles. Stockton dished double the assists. Quiet greatness, loud numbers.
connection.relationship: Humble servants whose consistency created untouchable records

interactions.description: Humble acknowledgment between two who did the work without the flash
